data.name: AccreditationBodyFilter
data.value: {0} IN (SELECT AccreditationBodyId FROM SearchRecordAccreditationBodyLink WHERE SearchRecordAccreditationBodyLink.RecordId = SearchRecord.Id)

data.name: FromClause
data.value: FROM SearchRecord INNER JOIN EntityType ON SearchRecord.EntityTypeId = EntityType.Id LEFT JOIN Image ON SearchRecord.ImageId = Image.Id LEFT JOIN ImageType ON Image.TypeId = ImageType.Id LEFT JOIN SearchRecord AS ParentSearchRecord ON SearchRecord.ParentId = ParentSearchRecord.Id LEFT JOIN EntityType AS ParentEntityType ON ParentSearchRecord.EntityTypeId = ParentEntityType.Id LEFT JOIN Image AS ParentImage ON ParentSearchRecord.ImageId = ParentImage.Id LEFT JOIN ImageType AS ParentImageType ON ParentImage.TypeId = ParentImageType.Id LEFT JOIN Friendship ON EntityType.Name = 'Profile' AND Friendship.FriendId = SearchRecord.EntityId AND Friendship.ProfileId = {11}

data.name: OffsetFetchClause
data.value: OFFSET {0} ROWS FETCH NEXT {1} ROWS ONLY

data.name: SelectClause
data.value: SELECT COUNT(*) OVER () AS TotalCount, SearchRecord.EntityId AS EntityId, EntityType.Name AS EntityTypeName, EntityType.DisplayName as EntityTypeDisplayName, EntityType.DisplayPlural as EntityTypeDisplayPlural, EntityType.Controller as Controller, SearchRecord.Name AS Name, SearchRecord.Description AS Description, SearchRecord.City AS City, SearchRecord.Area AS Area, SearchRecord.Country AS Country, SearchRecord.Postcode AS Postcode, SearchRecord.Location AS LocationGeography, Image.Guid AS ImageGuid, Image.Path AS ImagePath, ImageType.Extension AS ImageExtension, SearchRecord.Rating AS Rating, SearchRecord.Stubbed AS Stubbed, COALESCE(Friendship.Pending, CAST(0 AS BIT)) AS FriendshipPending, COALESCE(Friendship.Confirmed, CAST(0 AS BIT)) AS FriendshipConfirmed, COALESCE(Friendship.BlockedByProfile, CAST(0 AS BIT)) AS FriendshipBlockedByProfile, COALESCE(Friendship.BlockedByFriend, CAST(0 AS BIT)) AS FriendshipBlockedByFriend, ParentSearchRecord.EntityId AS ParentEntityId, ParentEntityType.Name AS ParentEntityTypeName, ParentSearchRecord.Name AS ParentName, ParentSearchRecord.Description AS ParentDescription, ParentSearchRecord.City AS ParentCity, ParentSearchRecord.Area AS ParentArea, ParentSearchRecord.Country AS ParentCountry, ParentSearchRecord.Postcode AS ParentPostcode, ParentSearchRecord.Location AS ParentLocationGeography, ParentImage.Guid AS ParentImageGuid, ParentImage.Path AS ParentImagePath, ParentImageType.Extension AS ParentImageExtension, ParentSearchRecord.Rating AS ParentRating

data.name: StyleFilter
data.value: {0} IN (SELECT StyleId FROM SearchRecordStyleLink WHERE SearchRecordStyleLink.RecordId = SearchRecord.Id)

data.name: TeacherFilter
data.value: {0} IN (SELECT TeacherId FROM SearchRecordTeacherLink WHERE SearchRecordTeacherLink.RecordId = SearchRecord.Id)

data.name: TeacherServiceFilter
data.value: {0} IN (SELECT TeacherServiceId FROM SearchRecordTeacherServiceLink WHERE SearchRecordTeacherServiceLink.RecordId = SearchRecord.Id)

data.name: VenueFilter
data.value: {0} IN (SELECT VenueId FROM SearchRecordVenueLink WHERE SearchRecordVenueLink.RecordId = SearchRecord.Id)

data.name: VenueServiceFilter
data.value: {0} IN (SELECT VenueServiceId FROM SearchRecordVenueServiceLink WHERE SearchRecordVenueServiceLink.RecordId = SearchRecord.Id)
